title: Mushroom 25 live: Telstra concert of the century
brief_description: On Saturday the 14th of November 1998, some of Australia’s most popular performers gathered to celebrate 25 years of the Mushroom recording label- thousands of fans representing a multitude of generations packed into the Melbourne Cricket Ground for the musical spectacular. This three video set features almost six hours of live performances by the greatest names in Australian music including: Moler, Machinations, Scott Carne, Painters & Dockers, Nick Barker, Paul Norton, Wendy Stapleton, Stars, Dynamic Hepnotics, The Badloves, Chain, Juno Roxus, Dave Warner, The Ferrets, Weddings Parties Anything, Chris Wilson, Wilson Diesel, Vika and Linda, Madder Lake, Chantoozies, James Freud, Swoop, Christie Allen, Uncanny X-Men, Dannii and Kylie Minogue, The Mavis’s, Deborah Conway, Archie Roach, Ruby Hunter, Mark Seymour, Chris Bailey, Paul Kelly, Renee Geyer, The Sports, Mick Molloy, Sunnyboys, Ol‘55, Billy Thorpe, Choirboys, Ian Moss, Kate Ceberano, Peter Andre, Deni Hines, Leonardo’s Bride, The Whitlams, The Angels, Jimmy Barnes, and INXS.
